BR.name: Word Puzzles by POWGI
BR.description: Enjoy more great POWGI word puzzles with this bumper collection of six new games! Solve hundreds of pencil-and-paper style puzzles using the stylus and intuitive touch-screen controls. Get extra challenges by touching any amiibo™ to generate special puzzles, just for you! The puzzles included are: Word Maze Like a wiggly word search! Find the words and solve the maze! Mixups A fiendishly difficult anagram puzzle with three words all jumbled together! One Word The word search puzzle where there's only one word to find! Flowers Plant pairs of letters around the flower to grow six words with a common middle. Circles Three overlapping circles hide three connected words. Find the missing letter to unscramble them all! Crossovers Crossword puzzles with only one letter missing, which come together to solve a clue! POWGI puzzles are all expertly hand-crafted for your enjoyment and puzzling pleasure!

CA.name: Word Puzzles by POWGI
CA.description: Purchase this game at full price through Nintendo eShop and get a free digital version of Word Puzzles by POWGI for Wii U. The same Nintendo Network ID must be linked to your Wii U and Nintendo 3DS systems as well as your eShop account prior to purchase in order to be eligible for the offer. Crossovers Crossword puzzles with only one letter missing, which come together to solve a clue! POWGI puzzles are all expertly hand-crafted for your enjoyment and puzzling pleasure!

MX.name: Word Puzzles by POWGI
MX.description: Compra este juego a precio normal a través de Nintendo eShop y consigue una versión digital gratuita de Word Puzzles by POWGI para Wii U. Debes vincular el mismo Nintendo Network ID a tus consolas Wii U y Nintendo 3DS, así como a tu cuenta de eShop antes de la compra para poder optar a la oferta.
